meta_description: Located on the edge of the active flight line at March Field Air Reserve Base in Riverside, March Field Air Museum offers an unparalleled view of the most modern military aircraft in the United States Air Force. March Field, one of the oldest military airfields in the United States, was originally founded as Alessandro Field in 1918 as one of 32 Air Service training camps following the United States’ entry into WWI. Visitors can experience the full evolution of flight through an impressive collection of over 115 aircraft, spanning more than 120 years of aviation history. From early pioneers of powered flight to iconic World War II bombers and cutting-edge drones, the museum provides a comprehensive look at the advancements in aviation. With something for everyone, March Field Air Museum is a must-visit destination for aviation enthusiasts and families alike.
hours_text:
# HOURS, TICKETS & DIRECTIONS

## Admission Fees

Museum Members – **FREE**

Adults (12 years and older) – **$18.00**

Senior (62 years and older) – **$12.00**

Veterans (Thank you for your Service) – **$10.00**

Children (5-11 years old) – **$10.00**

Children (4 years old and under) – **FREE**

Active Duty, Active Guard and Active Reserves – **FREE**

[**For Group Requests, please visit our Group Visits page**](https://www.marchfield.org/group-visits/)

## Upcoming Events

### [Save the Dates: Santa’s Appearances](https://www.marchfield.org/event/dates-for-santas-appearance-14th/)

### [Save the Dates: Santa’s Appearances](https://www.marchfield.org/event/dates-for-santas-appearance/)

### [Cobi Model Kit Building Event](https://www.marchfield.org/event/cobi-model-kit-building-event/)

### [F-16 Unveiling](https://www.marchfield.org/event/f-16-unveiling/)

## Hours

Open 9AM – 5PM ; Tuesday – Sunday

Occasionally, hours are extended to allow for special activities, or the museum is closed to the public to accommodate scheduled events. Please see our Calendar or call the museum to confirm a specific date.

Open Martin Luther King Jr. Day, Presidents Day, Memorial Day and Labor Day

Closed Thanksgiving, Christmas and New Year’s Day

## Address, Directions & Parking

**March Field Air Museum,****22550 Van Buren Blvd,****Riverside, CA 92518**

**Located off I-215 adjacent to March Field Air Reserve Base**

**Free parking is available in the Museum parking lot**
